name: tpstop

stmt.origin: simplbi(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(c1)))
stmt.pretty: simplbi(c0 ∈ TopSp, c1 ∈ Top, (Base ` c0)= ⋃ c1)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(c1))))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp → c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧(Base ` c0)= ⋃ c1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(c1))))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp → c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧(Base ` c0)= ⋃ c1))

body.origin:
|- wb(wcel(c0, ctps), wa(wcel(c1, ctop), wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cuni(c1))))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp ↔(c1 ∈ Top ∧(Base ` c0)= ⋃ c1))
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wceq(cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cbs, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ TopSp → c1 ∈ Top)
⊣ (Base ` c0)=(Base ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(TopOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, ctps), wcel(c1, ctop))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, c0))

comment: The topology extractor on a topological space is a topology. (Contributed by FL, 27-Jun-2014.)
